modName: Uncle Sheo Does Climates of Tamriel
summary: This replaces the Climates of Tamriel loading screens with something a bit... Different.
descriptionHtml:
Remember that mod, Uncle Sheogorat\'s Really Helpful Hints and Tips? (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12234) I loved it. There are some other mods that I have that add loading screens to the game, I like the mods, but the loading screens are just missing something without Uncle Sheogorath. So this mod replaces the loading screens for Climates of Tamriel. Enjoy.

Credits: JJC71, creator of Climates of Tamriel. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802

Like this mod? Have JaySuS? Try this one as well. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24780

What about Phenderix? Want those Loading Screens spiced up? Done. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24884

Dawguard Loading Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31766

**NEW** Hearthfire Loading Screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31820

**NEW** Frostfall Loading Screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33738
author: Nonmeatbag
